page.title: 06TOURIST ATTRACTIONS.
page.content: Most people who have visited{Brook tell us that they enjoyed their visit because of the{tranquility}of the area. The{beach}is situated below sandstone cliffs and the people who visit Brook during the summer months say how peaceful and{secluded}it is. The beautiful country walks are popular with the visiting tourists. Many visitors pass through Brook on the{Military Road}whilst touring the island.The road itself proves to be a tourist attraction and was built by German prisoners during World War 2. Along the side of the road there are stone hats on top of fence posts as a reminder of the captured soldiers. The picturesque village is also an attraction to visitors with its{pretty {green}and{bubbling brook.
